name: Burg_268
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with riveric loanwords
diet heavy on salted fish and fermented seaweeds
stilted wooden architecture resilient to tides
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: navigational auguries exist but do not replace seamanship
combustion industry limited; no high-pressure steam tech
state affiliation unknown; governance likely loose
